com.bt.npm.netrep.common
Class NpmFileParser

java.lang.Object
  com.bt.npm.netrep.common.NpmFileParser

public final class NpmFileParser
extends java.lang.Object

The class is designed to read flat files (text-based) where each line of the file is considered to be a record. Records are separated by a delimiter to differentiate the columns.

The rows comprising of the column values can be retrieved as a list of Array.
For example : File with ','(comma) separated records containing information about Network Elements with different properties like ipaddress, elementName etc.

NOTE: This is not a thread-safe implementation

Author:
608952343(AP)

mode - : File mode (FILE_READ_MODE, FILE_READ_WRITE_MODE)
delimeter - : The delimiter to parse the column values
batchSize - : To define how many records to be read in one batch
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
Method Detail

getNextRowsBatch

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getNextRowsBatch()
                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
Every call to this method will return the number of lines defined by batchSize property.
Note : The batch size is not strictly followed due to some optimization. There could be a 5-10% tolerance of getting more records. Use of return list size or iterator.hasNext() method is recommended for iterating over the results.

Returns:
List of String[]
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
